entry.title: Popeye Candy Sticks - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 4.99

Nostalgic 50s Sweets to Share!

     Popeye Candy Sticks are the perfect treat to share with all the kids on Halloween, they bring back so many fond trick-or-treating memories! This 24 count bulk bag makes it easy to fill a bowl full of the retro classic candy to pass around or leave out for a fun party. 

60g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: Kit Kat Fruity Cereal - 1.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.99

A Brand NEW Way to Take a Break!

     Nothing's better than the nostalgic taste of a bowl full of Froot Loops cereal on a Saturday morning. Maybe adding a delicious, crunchy wafer into the mix makes for a close second, though!

     Kit Kat has come dressed up in an all-new flavour, each bite delivering a whole bowl of Fruity Cereal flavour. Creamy creme flavoured like a bowl of Fruity Pebbles envelops the tasty wafer you love so much. So you can forget the milk and the bowl, just unwrap one of these bars to get your cereal fix!

 

1.5oz / 42g | 1 bar

entry.title: Juicy Drop Gummy Dip 'N Stix - 96g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topps Company Inc.
Type: Candy District
Price: 3.99

As Seen on Tik Tok

Sweet Gummy Sticks with Sour Dipping Gel

Juicy Drop Gummy Dip 'N Stix are sweet and sour candy that is fun for everyone! They come in four intense flavours of Knock Out Punch, Blue Rebel, Wild Cherry Berry, and Watermelon Blast. Take the soft and chewy gummy candy sticks and dip them in that sour gel that will make you pucker! Create your own delicious mix of sweet and sour. Stock up the pantry with an 8 count box because anytime could be party time.

 

96 g Container | 8 CT BOX

entry.title: Zaini Unicorns Chocolate Eggs - 20 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zaini
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.99

European Chocolate Eggs

Once upon a time, there were magical creatures that inhabited the earth, we know them as unicorns. They were bright and beautiful and made friends easily by giving out their delicious chocolate surprise eggs!
Not only were these eggs absolutely delectable, but they also contained a surprise unicorn-themed toy inside! They called these eggs, the Zaini Unicorn Chocolate Eggs.
This made all the flying fairies,  funny elves and wise old dwarfs love them even more!
You see, these mythical creatures never ever wanted to be forgotten, that's why they created these very special chocolate eggs!
Remember the enchanting unicorns with the Zaini Unicorn Chocolate Eggs and you will live happily ever after!

20 g

entry.title: Sour Sneaky Stardust Bubble Gum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kidsmania
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

Sour Bubble Gum

The mystery here is just how does this sour-tasting, mystical powder turn into gum? We love to think about this while chewing on wads of the Sour Sneaky Stardust Bubble Gum!
This fascinating bubblegum comes in three flavours, Blue Raspberry, Green Apple and Sour Strawberry.
The Sour Sneaky Stardust Bubble Gum comes in its own jug, so you can share it with your favourite people or simply save some for later.
Experience the magic for yourself with the Sour Sneaky Stardust Bubble Gum!

entry.title: Big Mouth Candy Spray - 23g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bazooka Candy Brands
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

Bazooka Candy Brands

Get your candy-fix on the go. Bazooka Candy Brands brings you Big Mouth Candy Spray. And this is a huge box of 12, so you know you won't run out – at least for a while.

There's a variety of colours and flavours too, so you can pick and choose. Bazooka is a legendary candy brand you'll remember from your childhood. So you know you're going to love these. Go for a stroll down memory lane while spraying this yummy candy spray into your mouth. Open wide!

Big Mouth Candy Spray comes in a fun display box, too, just like in the candy store. Stock up the pantry and pretend you have your own corner store at home!

23 g

Bazooka Candy Brands

Liven up your taste buds with the sour zing of Big Mouth Sour Candy spray. In colourful shades of pink, blue, and green, the sprays come displayed in a cute box worthy of any candy store. Pretend you have your own candy shop at home.

This candy is the perfect treat if you just want a sour shot of flavour. Have this generous box of 12 around for when family and friends want a treat, too. This is a great reward for work well done.

Share childhood memories of going to the corner store for candy with friends. Your kids will love to share these treats with their friends, too.

23 g

entry.title: Razzles Berry Mix Candy - 1.6 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Concord Confections
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

First, it's candy. Then it's gum.

"First it's a candy, then it's gum." Now Razzles Berry Mix is all that but with the extra turn of being candy-coated with the delicious berry flavours of strawberry, blueberry and raspberry. You will be berry happy.

First its a candy,
then its a gum.
If you're indecisive 
this is the one!
You'll be delighted,
amazed and so
dazzled,
when your mouth 
meets the taste
of these magnificent
Razzles!
  • Resealable Bag
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Peanut Free/Nut Free

1.6 oz. Pack 

Ingredients:

Sugar, gum base, dextrose, calcium stearate, natural and artificial flavours, citric acid, gum arabic, tapioca dextrin, artificial colours (FD&C red 40 lake, blue 1 lake), carnauba wax, BHT (to maintain freshness).

Soy may be present.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.
